column6: Reed Richards's secret plan is revealed at last, and a full scale Avengers assault on the Baxter Building is the result! But for which team will Susan Storm fight? And why are there TWO Black Widows?
column7: | Avengers | Black Widow | Captain America | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic
column8: | penciller (cover):Ronan Cliquet | penciller:Scott Koblish | editor:Bill Rosemann | writer:Paul Tobin
